archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.3.3b: b) key risk indicators (KRIs): which are often qualitative and subjective, reflect an informed view of future risks typically expressed in terms of likelihood and impact, and used to provide an insightful narrative.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
